page.title: 19LOCHALSH BROWNIE PACK.
page.content: The Brownies are for girls aged seven to eleven.They wear a brown uniform, hat and a yellow tie with the promise badge on it.When a girl starts Brownies she has to know her Brownie Law and Promise.Our pack is called the 2nd Lochalsh Pack.We meet every Tuesday night at Balmacara Church hall.Mrs Campbell,Miss Carr and Mrs Thomas are the leaders.There are about twenty girls who come from Glenshiel, Inverinate,Dornie,Balmacara and Achmore.We learn songs,do small jobs, play games and go on outings.This year we went to Inverness to receive our new flag.We also spent a day at the Guide camp.We can also work for different badges which we sew on our dress sleeves.When a Brownie is ten years old she can join the Guides.
